comment.author: 7776496@N03
comment._content: Get it right people!!! What are we paying taxes for? Misinformation? Not a "shell" jacket, nor a "sack" coat! It is a Frock Coat! Shells end AT the waist, Sacks a little BELOW the waist, and a Frock from MID-THIGH to the almost the KNEE
